com.kroy.game.scenes

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kroy.game.scenes.Scene
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyWinScene, GameScene, HumanWinScene, MainMenuScene, MinigameScene

    public abstract class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
    Class added asa a result of refractoring by Septagon Abstract class that holds all features that all scenes must have
